name: Full of Protein
description: Three types of quinoa, two types of lentils, chickpeas, sweet potatoes caramelized with spices and chopped coriander. Served with a tzatziki on the side

name: Yeast Pastry
description: Salty yeast pastry with different fillings - comes with tzatziki or tahini

name: Shimi Sandwich
description: Patties with seaweed in a spicy tomato sauce on pomegranate mayonnaise - comes in the house ciabatta

name: McCartney
description: Shepherd's pie with vegan "meat", vegetables, legumes, mashed potatoes and rich gravy

name: Fungi Ravioli
description: Gluten-free pasta with mushrooms, onions, garlic, pesto, soy-coconut cream.

name: Mint Pea Soup
description: Dried peas, fresh peas, onions, garlic, mint and coconut cream - greenish and delicious
